channel.title: Need a coder! (317)
channel.description:
I am looking for a 317 coder. I am currently working two jobs at 15 hours a day and just do not have the time to code anymore. I have multiple ideas that can be talked about and you will recieve 100% credits. I would like it to be an allstar based server but we can talk and work things out. I don't want to give any ideas away on here because it's things I haven't seen much or any of. So add me on skype -Crazycrashheim95- or e-mail me -Kyleheim@live.com- reply in post or message me on here if you think you can do it. Thanks a lot, Guardianman5
Also, I could help out a little bit with the coding if you need some things done, but wont be to much haha

item.title: Need a coder! (317)
item.dc:creator: @Guardianman5 Guardianman5
item.description:
@Guardianman5 wrote:

I like the way you put that Justin. Nicely said

Read full topic

item.title: Need a coder! (317)
item.dc:creator: @justinperry justinperry
item.description:
@justinperry wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:2, topic:525987”]Isn’t that a bit though? Other person will do work for you, and you basically just sit and watch next to him…
I understand, that your irl job takes a lot of time, but then you shouldnt even start this kind of project, or are you ready to pay for work, what is done?

Please think it once more through.[/quote]
Dude that’s like saying, buying a VPS is completely stupid, if you can’t run it yourself, why run it at all? That’s what you just said in different words.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a coder! (317)
item.dc:creator: @Guardianman5 Guardianman5
item.description:
@Guardianman5 wrote:

Well I havae allstarscape and I have done a little bit to it, I just need a couple of codes written which I’m sure I could find on this site somewhere but I just have no time at all to look for them or put them in, I guess I’ll just close this thread and do it on my own because I guess you are right. I’ll just need to find some time.

Can a mod please lock this? I’m done with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a coder! (317)
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Isn’t that a bit though? Other person will do work for you, and you basically just sit and watch next to him…
I understand, that your irl job takes a lot of time, but then you shouldnt even start this kind of project, or are you ready to pay for work, what is done?

Please think it once more through.

Read full topic
